author: Reuters Editorial
title: Berlin: Merkel likely to discuss Russia during U.S. visit next week
text:
BERLIN (Reuters) - German Chancellor Angela Merkel is likely to discuss Russia when she meets U.S. President Donald Trump in Washington next week, a government spokesman said on Friday.
German Chancellor Angela Merkel is seen before welcoming French President Emmanuel Macron at the building site of the Humboldt Forum in Berlin, Germany, April 19, 2018. REUTERS/Axel Schmidt The United States on April 6 imposed sanctions against Russian entities and individuals to punish Moscow for its alleged meddling in the 2016 U.S. election and what the U.S. Treasury Department dubbed other “malign activity.”
Reporting by Michelle Martin and Thomas Escritt
